round_best: Develop a method of zero-shot domain adaptation for vision-language models by integrating unsupervised data augmentation techniques. The model, starting from its pre-trained state, generates synthetic image-text pairs from unlabelled data in the target domain using generative adversarial networks (GANs). This method would seamlessly adapt the model to new domains without requiring expensive labeled datasets, enhancing its flexibility and reducing the dependency on domain-specific data.
